title: Pixel 3a, no Android 11?
content:
Hi all.

I've been told repeatedly that Android 11 is rolling out to my Pixel 3a over the 2 weeks after launch. I have had this confirmed when asking in support that this means September 22 (As Android 11 launched on September 8). When I asked what I'd need to do if I didn't get Android 11 by that date, I was told that I definitely would and I should stop worrying.

Well, September 22 has come and gone and I haven't received the update. I have ruined my setup by performing a factory reset, and after being referred to a specialist in Support chat, I was told to wait. 

Why was I given a 2-week timeframe which has now not been met? And is anyone else not getting the Android 11 update yet?

(UK based, just before people come in with the delays in India).
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
